${ModID}:ReapingSlash.NAME: Reaping Slash
${ModID}:ReapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ReapingSlashRhaast.NAME: Reaping Slash
${ModID}:ReapingSlashRhaast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ReapingSlashAssassin.NAME: Reaping Slash
${ModID}:ReapingSlashAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies. NL Enemy loses !${ModID}:m2! HP.

${ModID}:BladeSpin.NAME: Blade Spin
${ModID}:BladeSpin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ShowersOfBlood.NAME: Showers Of Blood
${ModID}:ShowersOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP X times. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.

${ModID}:FrenziedStrike.NAME: Frenzied Strike
${ModID}:FrenziedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times.

${ModID}:FrenziedStrikeAssassin.NAME: Frenzied Strike
${ModID}:FrenziedStrikeAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 4 times.

${ModID}:FrenziedStrikeRhaast.NAME: Frenzied Strike
${ModID}:FrenziedStrikeRhaast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times.

${ModID}:TacticalSelection.NAME: Tactical Selection
${ModID}:TacticalSelection.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TacticalSelection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

${ModID}:PressTheAdvantage.NAME: Press The Advantage
${ModID}:PressTheAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card from your discard pile and place it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PressTheAdvantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card from your discard pile and place it into your hand.

${ModID}:SwiftDodge.NAME: Swift Dodge
${ModID}:SwiftDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If this is the first card you've played this turn gain an additional !${ModID}:sb! Block.

${ModID}:BloodReaper.NAME: Blood Reaper
${ModID}:BloodReaper.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ReapAndTear.NAME: Reap And Tear
${ModID}:ReapAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DarkPact.NAME: Dark Pact
${ModID}:DarkPact.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add !${ModID}:m2! random 0 cost Ethereal cards to your hand.

${ModID}:FadeIntoShadows.NAME: Fade Into Shadows
${ModID}:FadeIntoShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:AdaptiveStrategy.NAME: Adaptive Strategy
${ModID}:AdaptiveStrategy.DESCRIPTION: If you played no attacks this turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:Bloodrage.NAME: Bloodrage
${ModID}:Bloodrage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, draw a card.

${ModID}:ReapingWhirlwind.NAME: Reaping Whirlwind
${ModID}:ReapingWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies X times. NL Trigger ${ModID}:Reap on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DesperateMeasures.NAME: Desperate Measures
${ModID}:DesperateMeasures.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have less than 50% health, gain an additional !B! Block.

${ModID}:RecklessAttack.NAME: Reckless Attack
${ModID}:RecklessAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.

${ModID}:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
${ModID}:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Unspent [E] is conserved this turn. Exhaust.
${ModID}:Meditation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Unspent [E] is conserved this turn.

${ModID}:FuturePlanning.NAME: Future Planning
${ModID}:FuturePlanning.DESCRIPTION: Unspent [E]  is conserved this turn. NL Next turn, draw cards equal to the amount of cards remaining in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ProfaneBlow.NAME: Profane Blow
${ModID}:ProfaneBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this attack kills the enemy, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:ShedWeakness.NAME: Shed Weakness
${ModID}:ShedWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Remove all debuffs from yourself. Gain 1 Strength for each debuff removed. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SanguineStrike.NAME: Sanguine Strike
${ModID}:SanguineStrike.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:SiphonStrength.NAME: Siphon Strength
${ModID}:SiphonStrength.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Strength from ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShadowstepRhaast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${ModID}:ShadowstepAssassin.NAME: Shadow Step
${ModID}:ShadowstepAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Distract.NAME: Distract
${ModID}:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

${ModID}:AssassinsTraining.NAME: Assassin's Training
${ModID}:AssassinsTraining.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have unspent [E] ,  gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:DemonArmor.NAME: Demon Armor
${ModID}:DemonArmor.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have unspent [E] , gain !M! Block for each unspent [E] .

${ModID}:MasterZedsTraining.NAME: Master Zed's Training
${ModID}:MasterZedsTraining.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have unspent NL  [E] , draw !M! card(s).

${ModID}:SiphoningStrikes.NAME: Siphoning Strikes
${ModID}:SiphoningStrikes.DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${ModID}:Reap to an enemy gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Gank.NAME: Gank
${ModID}:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the enemy's Strength by !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Choose a card in your draw pile and give it Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.NAME: Umbral Trespass
${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaustive 2.

${ModID}:UmbralTrespassRhaast.NAME: Umbral Trespass

${ModID}:UmbralTrespassRhaast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain 4 Max HP. NL  Exhaustive 2.

${ModID}:UmbralTrespassAssassin.NAME: Umbral Trespass
${ModID}:UmbralTrespassAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, deal 50% of damage done to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:UmbralTrespassAssassin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of your next turn, deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive 2.

${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.NAME: Strategic Maneuver
${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards from your draw pile, upgrade them for the rest of combat and place them at the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.NAME: Gold Advantage
${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Gain Vigor based on current Gold. Exhaust. NL 1-100: 8 Vigor. NL 101-200: 12 Vigor. NL 201-300: 16 Vigor. NL 301+: 20 Vigor.

${ModID}:MoltenBlood.NAME: Molten Blood
${ModID}:MoltenBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. Deal !D! damage. Target loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ReapersToll.NAME: Reaper's Toll
${ModID}:ReapersToll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the enemy's current ${ModID}:Reap. NL Remove ${ModID}:Reap. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StackTheDeck.NAME: Stack The Deck
${ModID}:StackTheDeck.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your exhaust pile and place them on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FlurryOfBlades.NAME: Flurry Of Blades
${ModID}:FlurryOfBlades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

${ModID}:FlurryOfBladesRhaast.NAME: Flurry Of Blades
${ModID}:FlurryOfBladesRhaast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL (Damage is increased by 25% of your Temporary HP.)

${ModID}:FlurryOfBladesAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL (Damage is increased by 1 per [E] used.)

${ModID}:ShadowWaltz.NAME: Shadow Waltz

${ModID}:Outburst.NAME: Outburst
${ModID}:Outburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Shuffle a Void into your discard pile.

${ModID}:SlaughterTheWeak.NAME: Slaughter The Weak

${ModID}:BloodGambit.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain [E] and draw a card. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal additional damage equal to half of the targets current ${ModID}:Reap.

${ModID}:ShadowClone.NAME: Shadow Clone
${ModID}:ShadowClone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Add an Ethereal copy with 1 reduced cost into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this dealt at least !M! damage, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ShadowSightAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] . NL You can only play two of this card per turn.

${ModID}:CalculatedStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower this cards cost by 1.

${ModID}:Brutalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target does not have Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.NAME: Shadow Ambush
${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has a debuff, deal an additional !${ModID}:sd! damage.

${ModID}:DarkinRage.NAME: Darkin Rage
${ModID}:DarkinRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain !M! Strength.
